sentences.sContent: An old Arab proverb says, "The enemy of my enemy is my friend."
sentences.sCn: 有一句古老的阿拉伯谚语说：“我敌人的敌人是我的朋友。”

synos.tran: 谚语，格言；众所周知的人或事

words.tran: 谚语的；众所周知的；谚语式的

remMethod.val: pro (在前的) + verb (动词) → 以前留下的话 → 谚语， 俗语

trans.tranOther: a short well-known statement that gives advice or expresses something that is generally true. ‘A penny saved is a penny earned’ is an example of a proverb.
